sentences.sContent: Our brows went up in surprise.
sentences.sCn: 我们惊奇地竖起了眉毛。

sentences.sContent: His father stared in surprise and then burst out in tears.
sentences.sContent_eng: His father stared in surprise and then burst out in tears.
sentences.sCn: 他父亲惊奇地盯着他，然后便泪如泉涌。

sentences.sContent: You are an impertinent little monkey!' exclaimed Mrs Linton, in surprise.
sentences.sContent_eng: You are an impertinent little monkey!' exclaimed Mrs Linton, in surprise.
sentences.sCn: “你是一个胡闹的小猴子！” 林惇夫人惊奇地叫起来。
